verses.verse: Simon <S%G4826><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Apostle <S%G652><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Like Precious <S%G2472><s%> With Us <S%G2254><s%> Obtained <S%G2975><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Through The <S%G1722><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Of Our God <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ : <S%G5547><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> Be Multiplied <S%G4129><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Knowledge <S%G1922><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Our Lord. <S%G2257><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Divine <S%G2304><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Which Pertain <S%G3588><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Piety <S%G2150><s%> Has Given, <S%G1433><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Knowledge <S%G1922><s%> Of Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Virtue, <S%G703><s%>

' Through <S%G1223><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Greatest <S%G3176><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Precious <S%G5093><s%> Promises <S%G1862><s%> He Has Given, <S%G1433><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> These <S%G5130><s%> Ye May Become <S%G1096><s%> Of The Divine <S%G2304><s%> Partakers <S%G2844><s%> Nature, <S%G5449><s%> Having Escaped <S%G668><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The World <S%G2889><s%> Through <S%G1722><s%> Lust <S%G1939><s%> Corruption. <S%G5356><s%>

Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846><s%> For This Very Reason <S%G5124><s%> But, <S%G1161><s%> Diligence <S%G4710><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Having Brought In Besides, <S%G3923><s%> Supply Ye <S%G2023><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Your Faith <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Virtue, <S%G703><s%> <S%G1722><s%> And In <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Virtue <S%G703><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Knowledge, <S%G1108><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> And In <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Knowledge <S%G1108><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Self Control, <S%G1466><s%> <S%G1722><s%> And In <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Self Control <S%G1466><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Endurance, <S%G5281><s%> <S%G1722><s%> And In <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Endurance <S%G5281><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Piety, <S%G2150><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> And In <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Piety <S%G2150><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brotherly Love, <S%G5360><s%> <S%G1722><s%> And In <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brotherly Love <S%G5360><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love : <S%G26><s%>

<S%G5023><s%> For These Things <S%G1063><s%> In You <S%G5213><s%> Being <S%G5225><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Abounding To Be <S%G4121><s%> Neither <S%G3756><s%> Idle <S%G692><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Unfruitful <S%G175><s%> Make You <S%G2525><s%> As To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Knowledge; <S%G1922><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> For With Whom <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Are Not Present <S%G3918><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> He Is, <S%G2076><s%> Short Sighted, <S%G3467><s%> <S%G3024><s%> Having Forgotten <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Purification <S%G2512><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Old <S%G3819><s%> Of His <S%G846><s%> Sins. <S%G266><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Rather, <S%G3123><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Be Diligent <S%G4704><s%> Sure <S%G949><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Calling <S%G2821><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Election <S%G1589><s%> To Make, <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5023><s%> For These Things <S%G1063><s%> Doing <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shall Ye Stumble <S%G4417><s%> At Any Time. <S%G4218><s%>

Thus <S%G3779><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Richly <S%G4146><s%> Shall Be Supplied <S%G2023><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Entrance <S%G1529><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eternal <S%G166><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Will Not Neglect <S%G272><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Always <S%G104><s%> To Put In Remembrance <S%G5279><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> These Things, <S%G5130><s%> Although <S%G2539><s%> Knowing Them <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Been Established <S%G4741><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Present <S%G3918><s%> Truth. <S%G225><s%>

<S%G1342><s%> But Right <S%G1161><s%> I Esteem It, <S%G2233><s%> ' <S%G1909><s%> As Long As <S%G3745><s%> I Am <S%G1510><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Tabernacle, <S%G4638><s%> To Stir Up <S%G1326><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Putting You In Remembrance, <S%G5280><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Speedily <S%G5031><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Putting Off <S%G595><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4638><s%> Of My Tabernacle, <S%G3450><s%> To Be, As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Signified <S%G1213><s%> To Me; <S%G3427><s%>

<S%G4704><s%> But I Will Be Diligent <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> At Every Time <S%G1539><s%> <S%G2192><s%> For You To Have It In Your Power <S%G5209><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1699><s%> My Departure <S%G1841><s%> <S%G3588><s%> These Things <S%G5130><s%> <S%G3420><s%> To Have In Remembrance. <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Cleverly Imagined <S%G4679><s%> Fables <S%G3454><s%> Having Followed Out <S%G1811><s%> We Made Known <S%G1107><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Coming, <S%G3952><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Eye Witness <S%G2030><s%> Having Been <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of His <S%G1565><s%> Majesty. <S%G3168><s%>

Having Received <S%G2983><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> God The <S%G2316><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Honour <S%G5092><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Glory, <S%G1391><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Having Been Brought <S%G5342><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Such <S%G5107><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Very Excellent <S%G3169><s%> Glory : <S%G1391><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> My Son <S%G3450><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beloved, <S%G27><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Have Found Delight. 2106 V-AAI-1S

And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Brought, <S%G5342><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mount <S%G3735><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Holy. <S%G40><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> More Sure <S%G949><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophetic <S%G4397><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> To Which <S%G3739><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Ye Do <S%G4160><s%> Taking Heed, <S%G4337><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> To A Lamp <S%G3088><s%> Shining <S%G5316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> An Obscure <S%G850><s%> Place, <S%G5117><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G3739><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Should Dawn, <S%G1306><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Morning Star <S%G5459><s%> Should Arise <S%G393><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Your Hearts; <S%G5216><s%>

This <S%G5124><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> Knowing, <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Any <S%G3956><s%> Prophecy <S%G4394><s%> Of Scripture <S%G1124><s%> Of Its Own <S%G2398><s%> Interpretation <S%G1955><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not, <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> By The Will <S%G2307><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Was Brought <S%G5342><s%> At Any Time <S%G4218><s%> Prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> By The <S%G5259><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Being Borne, <S%G5342><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Men. <S%G444><s%>
